attributes.name: id
attributes.description: A unique id to identify an event for a domain

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Some of the values are Automation, Site Create, Endpoint Create etc

attributes.name: messageCode
attributes.description: Applicable values should be defiled in the Audit service and message can only be created by the Audit service, so that we can support i18N

attributes.name: messageDescription
attributes.description: Only for the additional information to debug an event internally

attributes.name: object
attributes.description: This is an entity in the domain space, like endpoint, task, sequence, alert, mailbox, ticket, auto-update etc

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Error code in case of failure and success code in case of Success

attributes.name: errorCode
attributes.description: Error code in case of failure and success code in case of Success

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: It could be a actual logged-in user or an originator service

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Created On timestamp to be added by the Audit service while creating Audit event
